author: Torreblanca Villalpando, Francisco, d. 1645
title: Daemonologia sive de magia naturali, daemonica, licita, et illicita, deque aperta et occulta, interventione et invocatione daemonis libri quatuor. Lib. 1 tractatur de magia divinatrice. Lib. 2 de magia operatrice. Lib. 3 de punitione hujus criminis in for
